title: BTC consolidates near $68k; watch $68.4k resistance / $67.25k pivot
summary: Binance BTCUSDT last ~$67,971. 24h range $65,756–$68,411 with near-flat change (-0.08%). Price is back above the 24h VWAP (~$67,254), suggesting buyers defended the mid-range, but breakout confirmation requires a clean move over ~$68.4k.
prediction: Base case (next 12–24h): range continuation $66k–$69k. Bullish continuation if BTC holds above ~$67.25k and breaks/holds above ~$68.4k; bearish if it loses ~$67.25k then retests ~$65.75k support.
